body.p: The following list covers some of the limitations with the Couchbase Analytics Service. Please read this carefully before reporting any new issues.We need to review this list with Will and update later as required.

row.entry: CBAS buckets are not updated if Couchbase bucket is deleted and then recreated while CBAS is connected.
The SELECT DISTINCT operation is not supported.
The MINUS, INTERSECT, UNION without ALL operations are not supported.
The OFFSET without a LIMIT is not supported.
The PREPARE statement is not supported.
The operation DML is not supported (CREATE, INSERT, DELETE, UPSERT, UPDATE)

entry.p: Changes to the Couchbase Server buckets, such as deleting or flushing a bucket, are not supported and may cause unpredictable behavior.
If you stop and start the Couchbase Analytics Service, the buckets are not automatically reconnected. You must manually reconnect them with the CONNECT BUCKET statement.
